premise_source_doc_sentence: He serves as the lead character of the comic books Hellblazer  (  1988 -- 2013  )  , Constantine  (  2013 -- 15  )  , Constantine : The Hellblazer  (  2015 -- 16  )  , and The Hellblazer  (  2016 --  )  .

claim: John Constantine has his own movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The titular Hellblazer , Constantine is a working class occult detective and con man stationed in London .

claim: John Constantine has his own movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is known for his endless cynicism , deadpan snarking , ruthless cunning and constant chain smoking , but is also a passionate humanist driven by a heartfelt desire to do some good in his life .

claim: John Constantine has his own movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Originally a supporting character who played a pivotal role in the `` American Gothic '' Swamp Thing storyline , Constantine received his own comic in 1988 .

claim: John Constantine has his own movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: A live-action film was released in 2005 entitled Constantine , in which an Americanized version of the character is played by actor Keanu Reeves .

claim: John Constantine has his own movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Welsh actor Matt Ryan was cast in the role of Constantine for the 2014 NBC television series Constantine , a role he reprised on The CW series Arrow , the animated film Justice League Dark and is set to reprise again in an upcoming animated continuation of his series on CW Seed .

claim: John Constantine has his own movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Empire ranked Constantine third in their 50 Greatest Comic Characters of All Time , while IGN ranked him No. 29 in their Top 100 Comic Book Heroes , and the character ranked No. 10 in Wizard '' s Top 200 Comic Book Characters of All Time .

claim: John Constantine has his own movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Each series has its own lead actors : Stephen Amell stars as Oliver Queen / Green Arrow on Arrow ; Grant Gustin stars as Barry Allen / Flash on The Flash ; Megalyn Echikunwoke stars as Mari Jiwe McCabe / Vixen in Vixen ; Arthur Darvill stars as Rip Hunter in Legends of Tomorrow , alongside an ensemble cast including Victor Garber as Martin Stein , Brandon Routh as Ray Palmer / The Atom , Ciara Renée as Kendra Saunders / Hawkgirl , Franz Drameh as Jefferson `` Jax '' Jackson , Dominic Purcell as Mick Rory / Heat Wave , Wentworth Miller as Leonard Snart / Captain Cold , Caity Lotz as Sara Lance / White Canary , Falk Hentschel as Carter Hall / Hawkman , Amy Pemberton as the voice of Gideon , Nick Zano as Nate Heywood , Maisie Richardson-Sellers as Amaya Jiwe / Vixen , and Matt Letscher as Eobard Thawne / Reverse-Flash ; and Matt Ryan reprises his role of John Constantine in Constantine from the NBC series of the same name .

premise_source_doc_sentence: Hellblazer  (  also known as John Constantine , Hellblazer  )  is an American contemporary horror comic book series , originally published by DC Comics , and subsequently by the Vertigo imprint since March 1993 when the imprint was introduced .
